description: A description of the digital representation of a reconstruction or simulation.

alias.description: An alternate short name of an item.

title.description: A descriptive name of an item.

modelScope.description: Extend of what type of reconstruction or simulation is digitally represented.

abstractionLevel.description: Extend of how the reconstruction or simulation is digitally represented.

modelFormat.description: Language (incl. version) in which the digitally representation of the reconstruction or simulation is written.
Compatibility of the chosen model format with it's previous or subsequent versions.

version.description: The version identifier of a creative work embodied by a specified resource.

versionSpecifications.description: A short description of what distinguishes this version from a previously released version.

license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

releaseDate.description: The release date of the resource.

DOI.description: The Digital Object Identifier (DOI) is a persistent, interoperable identifier for resources.

custodian.description: Person entrusted with guarding and keeping the resource.

mainContact.description: Person with expert knowledge about the resource and therefore can provide relevant information.

contributor.description: Person collecting, managing, distributing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the resource.

fundingInfo.description: Information about financial support (funding) for the resource being registered.

isNewVersionOf.description: Inicates that this resource is a new edition (modified or updated) of a previously released resource.

isPartOf.description: Lists if resource is part of a larger research project.

studiedSubjectAndOrTissueSample.description: Lists the studied subject(s) and/or tissue sample(s) of the resource.

focusOfStudy.description: Lists the foci (study target, temporal subject information) of the study conducted in the resource.

isDescribedBy.description: Publication(s) and/or file(s) that document(s) the resource.

isDerivedFrom.description: Lists the publication(s) used to produce the input to the resource.

usedMethodsAndOrParadigms.description: Lists the method(s) and/or paradigm(s) used to produce the content of the resource.
